snippet: The scale of a tuberculosis outbreak in rural Perry County widened Monday when state officials said that 47 residents last week tested positive for the bacterial infection.
abstract: Tuberculosis outbreak grips Perry County, Ala, where 47 residents  tested positive for bacterial infection; authorities will provide additional health care services to those infected in effort to contain outbreak, which has sickened 73 people in area since 2014.
lead_paragraph: The scale of a tuberculosis outbreak in rural Perry County widened Monday when state officials said that 47 residents last week tested positive for the bacterial infection.

headline.main: Alabama: More Test Positive for Tuberculosis
headline.print_headline: Alabama: More Test Positive for Tuberculosis
